Image.Text: Welcome to ChemCraft, a world where chemical compounds are alive and sentient! Who am I? Well perhaps a better question would be Where am I!

BOOM! I am a Methane molecule! I came from the beaker you had over the bunsen burner. On that note, you really should not place methane over fire. I'm highly flammable and if you were a little closer you would've gotten caught in my explosion. Lab safety is key.
Anyway, I'll be your guide and first chemical friend in your journey!. Oh boy, I can already feel the chemistry between us!
Your other best friend in this journey will be your JOURNAL. Your journal has all sorts of useful information, and is accessible through by pressing 'ENTER'.
Through your INFO menu, you'll have info about your party members. Namely me!
Higher Boiling Point means higher defense, and higher Combustion Enthalpy means higher offense.
Your ITEM menu will have items in your backpack.
You already have quite a few chemical reactants, which are required to pull off certain reactions in Chemical Battles!
As a Methane I can undergo Free Radical Substition in the presence of UV light and Bromine. You'll find out what that does soon enough!
The BOOK menu is your cheat sheet... ahem, research log on chemical compounds.
You can even access your BOOK in battle! After all, knowledge is power.
And lastly the PLAN menu lists the Chemists, or Chemicals you can meet and talk to in world of ChemCraft.
Whew. That's a lot of info. Well, I've been doing all the talking, so try talking to me this time!
Just walk up real close and cosy using 'WASD' and hit 'ENTER' to get my attention! By the way if you're too far away you'll only open your Journal.
